schemaViolations.description: Agent does not import schema validation functions
schemaViolations.recommendation: Add schema validation imports and usage

schemaViolations.description: Agent does not validate return values against schemas
schemaViolations.recommendation: Add schema validation before returning results

recommendations.recommendation: Replace 1 silent failure patterns with explicit error logging
recommendations.details: Add proper error handling and logging instead of silent null/undefined returns
Ensure all agents properly validate and structure their return values

recommendations.recommendation: Add fallback frequency metrics to track system health
recommendations.details: Monitor how often fallback content is generated to identify systemic issues

recommendations.recommendation: Add fallback indicators in the frontend
recommendations.details: Show users when fallback content is displayed so they understand data limitations
